name: declapract-typescript-ehmpathy
author: ehmpathy
description: declapract best practices declarations for typescript

scripts.biome:nested:readme: echo 'todo, remove the need for this once https://github.com/biomejs/biome/issues/7942 is fixed'
scripts.fix:format:biome: npm run biome:nested:hide && biome check --write; EXIT=$?; npm run biome:nested:restore; exit $EXIT
scripts.fix:lint: npm run biome:nested:hide && biome check --write; EXIT=$?; npm run biome:nested:restore; exit $EXIT
scripts.fix: npm run fix:format && npm run fix:lint
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:compile
scripts.test:commits: LAST_TAG=$(git describe --tags --abbrev=0 @^ 2> /dev/null || git rev-list --max-parents=0 HEAD) && npx commitlint --from $LAST_TAG --to HEAD --verbose
scripts.test:validate: npm run build && npx declapract validate
scripts.test:format:biome: npm run biome:nested:hide && biome format; EXIT=$?; npm run biome:nested:restore; exit $EXIT
scripts.test:lint:biome: npm run biome:nested:hide && biome check --diagnostic-level=error; EXIT=$?; npm run biome:nested:restore; exit $EXIT
scripts.test:lint:biome:all: npm run biome:nested:hide && biome check; EXIT=$?; npm run biome:nested:restore; exit $EXIT
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:biome && npm run test:lint:deps
scripts.test:acceptance:locally: npm run build && LOCALLY=true jest -c ./jest.acceptance.config.ts --forceExit --verbose --runInBand --passWithNoTests $([ -n $RESNAP ] && echo '--updateSnapshot')
scripts.test: npm run test:commits && npm run test:types && npm run test:format && npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:acceptance:locally && test:validate
scripts.prepush: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.prepare:rhachet: npx rhachet init --roles behaver mechanic reviewer
scripts.prepare: if [ -e .git ] && [ -z $CI ]; then npm run prepare:husky && npm run prepare:rhachet; fi
